title: Do we have to accept the free Kayle?
body: I have an aram only account with Lux, Sona and Ezreal. Having Kayle would mess this up so I would prefer not to receive it, thanks.

replies.body: can riot please give him also Skarner, Udyr and poppy for this account ?
Skarner actually really good on ARAM. He one of my top 5 favorite champs to get in the mode.

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnePWAGg,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2016-09-14T04:35:35.205+0000)
>
> Skarner actually really good on ARAM. He one of my top 5 favorite champs to get in the mode.

And Skarner is double-fucking hilarious on Poro King.
Oh god yes. The ult back to the king is so fun to do if you can pull it off correctly.
Give him Nunu. Incredibly useless in ARAM.
I'll be happy with just {{champion:48}}.has to be the worst ARAM champion out there

> [{quoted}](name=RogueWill,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnePWAGg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-14T03:31:22.787+0000)
>
> I'll be happy with just {{champion:48}}.has to be the worst ARAM champion out there

in my opinion juggernauts are particularly good in aram, since {{summoner:32}} makes them mobile and sticky.

for your own sake, i hope you never encounter me on the enemy team in that mode when i roll garen. i cant remember losing anything but 4v5's on him in that mode.

I have no problems with juggernauts or even tanks on ARAM, I have problems with {{champion:48}} in general since he is a duelist (he goes for long trades) so early game he is close to useless besides trying to pin someone with your pilar. As someone who ahs problems plaing passive (because I get bored) I end up too behind due to early game to catch up. I have moe luck with skarner and Udyr to be honest that with trundle

trundle is actually pretty good. max pillar first

I am apparently 8-5 on him

> [{quoted}](name=RogueWill,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnePWAGg,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-14T03:31:22.787+0000)

you are the problem

you are the problem

guess who I'm talking to.
Yourself.
whats the point of having an ARAM only account with only 3 champions. kinda defeats the purpose IMO

> [{quoted}](name=Technolians,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hnePWAGg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-14T03:22:56.374+0000)
>
> whats the point of having an ARAM only account with only 3 champions. kinda defeats the purpose IMO

people create "aram " accounts and set up full damage runes and masteries and only picks op champs into their champ pool so they know they will get 1 of 8 champs or in the OP case 1 of 3 champs, people find ways to beat that as well , you get boosting in rank, scripting, duo,3,4,5 man teams and now you get people cheating aram games cuz they are so hard up about winning an ALL RANDOM ALL MID game. 

pathetic really, people like that are the ones who call for a rank system for aram as well go figure 


{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Doesn't ARAM include free rotation?
no aram is a constant game mode

...the free champion rotation.

Not the rotating queue lol.
Either way it was rhetorical as I know the answer, it's yes. The free rotation champs are included in your possible aram picks, so buying 3 champs still wouldn't guarantee 1 of those 3. So OP's point makes no sense to begin with.

ok i must of misunderstood. but if you have 11 champs and 3 are hand picked for ARAM adding to it lessens the % of getting one of those 3 and everytime a champ is added the odds are less and less. but i get what your saying and i agree

>people like that are the ones who call for a rank system for aram as well go figure

Way to generalize. I'd like ranked ARAM, and I'm currently only missing five champs.

Oh hey buddy. nice to see you replying to me once again. lol.

But yea. its pretty pointless considering its meant to just be a time killer/relaxed mode.

Honestly. i perfer poro king over ARAM for fun. Pick some fun champs and throw poros. much more fun than ARAM. 

However, im curious as to how ARURF will work out

hey i reply to comments i feel are worthy and it still allows me to make my point on the thread. i honestly hate aram, and i didnt care for urf, doom bots was funny for a bit. i dont know about poro king at all... didnt really play twisted tree line either

I like URF for tanks because it lets me play tanks full AP or AD in a more casual setting. even in norms people will complain about a full AP/AD nautilus, malphite, leona but urf people tend to not care

lol right, she is hard as hell to deal with if she is fed, her dps is through the roof. getting to have 3 lvls when u start the game taking 1 in Q and 2 in her  E and start 3 dorans or whatever she is good to go run attack speed reds, ap quints, armor seals and a mix of cdr blues and mana regen

>hard as hell to deal with if she is fed

Jeez McGeez

>hell to deal with if she is fed

i wonder

>if she is fed

which champions

>is fed

aren´t like that.

hmm champs that dont scale well with kills .... {{champion:432}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:44}} u can give them a 4 kill head start and they just dont do enough damage to be worried about. but a fed {{champion:10}} can be a hyper carry and her dps is strong so people crying abot getting a FREE CHAMP are a bunch of bitchs

riot gives people a free game, they give away crap all the time, they give you runes for IP which you have to do nothing but play the game for, they create a hextech crafting reward system to get more free shit and they give you a free champ for not being a toxic assclown and what do people do ? 

BITCH

fml 

if i was riot at this point i made everything cost RP and league a subscription game with a cost for $ 



{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Can Riot just gift you all the champions then? It'd be so much better :)
People like you are why ARAM needs to be made so that all champs are available.
People like you who create ARAM accounts to feel good with themselfs shouldn't recieve free gifts anyway.
Sounds like we should just unlock every champion for you automatically.
Gift him Mordekaiser :3
It doesn't matter, its a free givt and you should accept this rarity

No idea if its been said already, but if you contact riot support and ask them to remove kayle from your account, they can.

Get rekt.

Kayle isnt even bad in ARAM.
...lame af

riot, if youre technically capable of giving someone the same champion multiple times, please give him 10 times {{champion:28}} and 10 times {{champion:421}}

i think he would really appreciate rolling his favourite champions for arams.
ARAM smurf commentary aside, I'm pretty sure player support can remove it from your account after you get it if you ask.
ARAM smurfs are going to get wrecked eventually anyway. Accept the wreckoning.

when it comes to ARAM i dont care win or lose, its so bs it dont matter. cant get really any cs in the game, cant buy unless you die. its just a big cluster fuck for 25 mins or so i dont get mad or twisted about someone going 2-21-3 or anything its just a clusterfuck of a game
